short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension displays images and videos from NASA's APOD.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension displays images and videos from NASA's APOD. The images and some videos will be updated every month based on availability from NASA APOD.
